text: Albert André (1930 - 16 April 2014) was a German Roman Catholic priest. He was a former Regional Dean and longtime pastor of Piesbach. He became a priest in 1968 and continued being a pastor until his retirement in 2008. He was born in Hülzweiler, Germany. André died in Piesbach, Germany from an illness, aged 84. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German Roman Catholic priests Category:People from Saarland
title: Albert André
